question: Will the floor price of CryptoPunks be above 75 ETH on November 30?
description:
This is a market on whether CryptoPunks will maintain a price floor over 75 ETH on November 30, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no CryptoPunks (on https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/forsale#) listed for 75 ETH or lower, and “No” otherwise. 

Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market (as verified by the transaction hash time).

question: Will Germany or United Kingdom report a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita on November 24?
description:
This is a market on whether Germany or United Kingdom will report a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita on November 24, 2021.

This market will resolve on data aggregated by Our World in Data, specifically, the 7-day rolling average of COVID-19 cases for Germany and United Kingdom, with Metric "Confirmed Cases", Interval "7-day rolling average", and the Relative to Population checkbox checked, which is available at https://ourworldindata.org/explorers/coronavirus-data-explorer.

The resolution source will be reviewed on November 25th at 11 PM ET and - if the data for November 24 will not be available then - checked again every 12 hours, until the final check on November 30, 11 PM ET. 
If the data is not available by then, this market will resolve based on other credible sources for the day of November 24. 

If Germany has a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita for the day of November 24, 2021, the market will resolve to "Germany." If United Kingdom has a higher 7-day COVID-19 case average per capita for the day of November 24, 2021, the market will resolve to "United Kingdom." If the averages per capita are the same, the market will resolve 50/50.
--------------------

OWiD dataset uses the most recent official numbers from governments and health ministries worldwide. Population estimates for per-capita metrics are based on the United Nations World Population Prospects. 

Here: https://github.com/owid/covid-19-data/tree/master/public/data one can find a detailed list of all our country-specific sources.

question: Will 'House of Gucci' get 86% or higher Audience Score on Rotten Tomatoes?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, as checked on the resolution date, the 'House of Gucci' movie will be given 86% or higher Rotten Tomatoes' Verified Audience Score, and "No" otherwise.

The resolution source (Audience Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/house_of_gucci) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - November 27 at 12:00 PM ET.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 6 hours, until the actual data is available.

If the data is not available on the resolution source by November 30, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.

---------------
'House of Gucci' will be released theatrically in the United States on November 24, 2021.

Rotten Tomatoes' Verified Audience Score that pertains to this market is the one on the main page of the resolution source. It is a percentage of RT users who made a verified movie ticket purchase rating this 3.5 stars or higher.

question: Will 229.5 million Americans have received at least one dose of an approved Covid-19 vaccination by November 29?
description:
This is a market on whether 229.5 million people in The United States of America will have initiated vaccination, according to the CDC COVID tracker, by the resolution date, November 29, 2021, 8:00 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 229.5 million people or more are listed as having received their initial dose of vaccination by the resolution source. This only concerns the first dose of vaccination. For vaccines requiring two doses for inoculation, this market considers only the first dose as having initiated vaccination. 
This market will resolve to "No" if, for any reason, fewer than 229.5 million people have initiated vaccination by the resolution date. 

The resolution source for this market will be the official data published by the CDC available at https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#vaccinations, and will be checked at the resolution time. 

If the website is down, the most recently available data will be used to resolve the market. If the website is not down, this market will resolve according to the data as available immediately at the time of resolution, and resolution will not be delayed for the purpose of waiting for updated data from a specific date.

question: Will Joe Biden's approval rating be 43.0% or higher at the end of November 23?
description:
This is a market on Joe Biden's approval rating for the day of November 23, 2021. The resolution source will be FiveThirtyEight's approval rating poll aggregator, https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/biden-approval-rating/, specifically the approval rating indicated by the green trend line for the date of November 23, 2021. 

This market resolves to "Yes" if the approval rating for the day of November 23, 2021 will be 43.0% or higher, and "No" otherwise.

The resolution date for this market will be on November 24, 2021 at 12:00 PM ET according to data published for the day of November 23. If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 24 hours until the actual data is available. If the actual data is not available on the resolution source by November 30, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50. 

If Joe Biden is not President on the resolution date, this market will resolve according to the most recent available approval rating.

Changes in the methodology by which FiveThirtyEight calculates the (dis)approval rating will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

question: Will total value locked in DeFi be $115 billion or higher on November 27th?
description:
This is a market on the total USD value locked in "Decentralized Finance" on November 27, 2021.

If the Total Value Locked (USD) at November 27, 2021 12:00 PM ET is $115.000B or greater this market resolves to ""Yes"". Otherwise, this market resolves to ""No"".

The resolution source will be the TVL (USD) value calculated by Defi Pulse and in the box named "Total Value Locked (USD)", available here: http://defipulse.com. 

If the data in the box is unavailable at November 27, 2021, 12:00 PM ET - the resolution source will be checked 6 hours later, and so on until the data in the box in available.
If data in the box is not available by November 30, 12 PM ET, the chart value for November 27, 2021 will be used instead, and if that is not available as well, the market will resolve to 50/50. 


---------
Total value locked (TVL), in the context of cryptocurrency, represents the sum of all assets deposited in DeFi protocols earning rewards, interest, new coins and tokens, fixed income, etc. 

DeFi is an abbreviation of the phrase decentralized finance which generally refers to digital assets and financial smart contracts, protocols, and decentralized applications (DApps)

question: Will a replacement for Jerome Powell as the Fed's chairman be announced by Noon ET, November 29, 2021?
description:
If the White House releases a statement indicating someone else other than Jerome Powell is or will be nominated as the next Chair of the Federal Reserve by November 29, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The statement must be unretracted and valid on the resolution time, November 29, 2021, 12:00 PM ET.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source is the White House official website, https://www.whitehouse.gov/, and any other official sources or credible definitive government statements to the media.

question: Will there be another NFL Scorigami in November 2021?
description:
In sports, a Scorigami is a scoring combination that has never happened before in a sport or league's history. 

In NFL's history, there have been 1069 unique scores. The most recent Scorigami for an NFL game occurred on November 4, 2021, when the Indianapolis Colts defeated the New York Jets by a score of 45–30.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one more NFL Scorigami will occur after the market inception date, November 15, 2 PM ET, and before the market resolution time, November 30, 12:00 PM ET.
Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is an official NFL website (https://www.nfl.com/scores/), however other sites tracking Scorigamis will be helpful (https://nflscorigami.com/, https://twitter.com/NFL_Scorigami)

question: Will the U.S. 7-day COVID-19 case average on November 23rd be higher than it was a week earlier?
description:
This is a market on whether the United States will report a 7-day average of COVID-19 cases for the date of November 23rd that is higher than the 7-day average of COVID-19 cases reported for the date of November 16th. This market will resolve on data from the CDC's Data Tracker, specifically, the 7-day moving average of COVID-19 cases for the United States, which is available at https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#trends_dailytrendscases (navigate to "Select a state or territory" and select “United States”, and then scroll to "Data Table for Daily Case Trends" and view the data in the "7-Day Moving Avg" column, which is able to be sorted in descending order). 

The resolution source will be reviewed at 8 PM ET on November 30, 2021 to check the 7-day average for both the dates of November 16th and November 23rd.  If the 7-day average for November 23rd exceeds that of November 16rd at this check, "Yes" will win.  
Otherwise, "No" will win.  

If the resolution source is unavailable at that time, the most recently available data for each day will be used.

question: Will NASA have confirmed more than 4580 existing exoplanets by November 27?
description:
This is a market on the number of confirmed exoplanets reported by NASA, on the resolution time: November 27th 2021, 8 PM ET.

If the number of confirmed exoplanets as reported by NASA is greater than 4,580 on resolution time, this market resolves to ""Yes"". Otherwise, this market resolves to ""No"".

The resolution source for this market is the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), which reports the number of confirmed exoplanets on their Exoplanet Exploration Program website: https://exoplanets.nasa.gov/

----------------

An exoplanet is any planet beyond our solar system. Most orbit other stars, but free-floating exoplanets, called rogue planets, orbit the galactic center and are untethered to any star.

When this market was created (November 15), the number of confirmed exoplanets was 4569.

question: Will there be 3 or more goals in USA v. Jamaica soccer game on November 16?
description:
In the upcoming FIFA World Cup 2022 Qualifier game between USA and Jamaica national soccer teams, scheduled for November 16:

If there are 3 or more total goals scored, this market will resolve to “Yes”. 

Otherwise, this market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by November 23, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

Note, that this market is about the sum of the goals scored which count for the game result, in regular and extra time. Disallowed goals do not count.

question: NBA: Who will win the Trail Blazers v. Raptors game on November 15th?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 15th:

If the Portland Trail Blazers win, the market will resolve to “Trail Blazers.” 

If the Toronto Raptors win, the market will resolve to “Raptors.” 

If the game is not completed by November 22, 2021, the market will resolve 52-48 favoring “Trail Blazers.”

question: Will ConstitutionDAO win the Sotheby’s auction for the United States Constitution?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if the resolution source lists ConstitutionDAO, or any entity acting as its representative, as the winner of the auction, which is scheduled to take place on November 18. This market will resolve to “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market will be the official Sotheby’s auction page: https://www.sothebys.com/en/buy/auction/2021/the-constitution-of-the-united-states-sold-to-benefit-the-dorothy-tapper-goldman-foundation/the-official-edition-of-the-united-states (Lot 1787), or any official Sotheby’s communication channels. If Sotheby’s does not formally list or announce the auction’s winner, a confirmation by ConstitutionDAO (https://www.constitutiondao.com/) which verifies their ownership of the constitution will suffice.

question: Will 231 million Americans have received at least one dose of an approved Covid-19 vaccination by November 29?
description:
This is a market on whether 231.0 million people in The United States of America will have initiated vaccination, according to the CDC COVID tracker, by the resolution date, November 29, 2021, 8:00 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 231.0 million people or more are listed as having received their initial dose of vaccination by the resolution source. This only concerns the first dose of vaccination. For vaccines requiring two doses for inoculation, this market considers only the first dose as having initiated vaccination. 
This market will resolve to "No" if, for any reason, fewer than 231.0 million people have initiated vaccination by the resolution date. 

The resolution source for this market will be the official data published by the CDC available at https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#vaccinations, and will be checked at the resolution time. 

If the website is down, the most recently available data will be used to resolve the market. If the website is not down, this market will resolve according to the data as available immediately at the time of resolution, and resolution will not be delayed for the purpose of waiting for updated data from a specific date.

question: What will the “Official Edition” of the United States Constitution sell for at Sotheby’s?
description:
In Response to Trader Inquiry: This market will resolve based on the final hammer price, as viewable through an official source such as a live auction video. The final realized price including fees, listed on Sotheby’s auction website, will NOT be applicable for this market.

In Response to Trader Inquiry: If the auction is cancelled altogether and not rescheduled within a week of November 18, 2021, the market will resolve to the lowest bracket “Less than 20m”. 

This is a market on the hammer price of The "Official Edition" of the United States Constitution and the First Printing of the Final Text of the Constitution (Lot 1787) auction at Sotheby’s, scheduled to take place on November 18, 2021. This market will resolve to the category which includes the final hammer price as listed on the official Sotheby’s auction website (https://www.sothebys.com/en/buy/auction/2021/the-constitution-of-the-united-states-sold-to-benefit-the-dorothy-tapper-goldman-foundation/the-official-edition-of-the-united-states).
